ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Component_position_in_building is the specification of the placement of an item, which is defined in its own coordinate space, in the coordinate space of a reference item.
Placement is specified as the transformation, applied to a representation of the shape of the placed item, that transforms the coordinates of the geometric entities of that representation into coordinates expressed in the coordinate system of a representation of the shape of the reference item.
the instance of an entity listed in reference_item_select type, that identifies the item with respect to which placement is specified.

The Geometric_model associated with the reference_context, in which the positioned item is located.
It shall contain Axis_placement instances associated with each item located with respect to the reference_context.
It may contain additional instances of geometric entities, describing shape aspects relevant in the context of the reference_organ.
This Geometric_model shall be associated through a Shape_description_association with an instance of Item_shape whose described_element attribute refers to the reference_context.
the instance of an entity listed in placed_item_select type, that identifies the placed item.

The Mapping_based_template_instance or the Transformation_based_template_instance that specifies the transformation of the geometric model of the shape of the placed item from its reference position, expressed in the coordinate system of that geometric model, to its position expressed in the reference_coordinate_space of the reference_context. This transformation is an isometry.
The Geometric_model that is referred to, indirectly, by the positioned_representation attribute and which defines the local geometry of the positioned_item, shall be associated with the positioned_item through an instance of Shape_description_association and of Item_shape.
The version of the positioned_item shall be distinct from the version of the reference_context.

A Component_position_in_building is the specification of the placement of a Building_element_component, which is represented in its own coordinate space, in the coordinate space of a Building_element.
Placement is specified as the transformation, applied to a representation of the shape of the placed item, that transforms the coordinates of the geometric entities of that representation into coordinates expressed in the coordinate system of a representation of the shape of the reference item.
the Building_element that identifies the item with respect to which placement is specified.

The Geometric_model associated with the reference_context, in which the positioned item is located.
It shall contain Axis_placement instances associated with each item located with respect to the reference_context.
It may contain additional instances of geometric entities, describing shape aspects relevant in the context of the reference_organ.
This Geometric_model shall be associated through a Shape_description_association with an instance of Item_shape whose described_element attribute refers to the reference_context.
the Building_element_component that identifies the placed item.

The Mapping_based_template_instance or the Transformation_based_template_instance that specifies the transformation of the geometric model of the shape of the placed item from its reference position, expressed in the coordinate system of that geometric model, to its position expressed in the reference_coordinate_space of the reference_context. This transformation is an isometry.
The Geometric_model that is referred to, indirectly, by the positioned_representation attribute and which defines the local geometry of the positioned_shape_element, shall be associated with the positioned_item through an instance of Shape_description_association and of Item_shape.
